t: Exposing The Fake Macy's Clearance Sale Electric Bike Scam
s: October 22, 2023 - One such online shopping scam making the rounds is the so-called Macy’s Clearance Sale Electric Bike Scam. This elaborate ruse utilizes the Macy’s branding and likeness to create fake shopping websites offering unbelievable discounts on electric bikes and other big-ticket items.
